skill_constraints: Key person dependency on Senior Dev for all security tasks.
resource_bottlenecks: Senior developer's time for security reviews and implementation.
mitigation_strategies: Aggressive pair programming and cross-training; risk of timeline slip remains.

skill_constraints: Onboarding and coordination with external consultant.
mitigation_strategies: Adding a part-time security consultant (10 hrs/week) to offload design review and provide expert guidance, accelerating security tasks and reducing risk.
